subtitle: Potato is grated and mixed with leeks, made into cakes and fried until golden and crispy.

method.text: Place potatoes and leeks in a bowl. Stir in salt and flour. Stir in enough of the egg until the mixture is evenly combined but not too wet.

Divide the potato mixture into cakes. Heat enough of the oil to cover the base of a non-stick frying pan. Cook two at a time, pressing them flat, for 3-4 min on each side until crispy and golden. Drain on kitchen paper. Keep warm while cooking the remainder.

title: Potato and leek cakes
